resume_text:
NAME: Carol Williams
EMAIL: carol.williams@example.com
PHONE: 555-555-5555

SUMMARY:
Experienced DevOps Engineer with a focus on automation and infrastructure as code. Dedicated to improving system reliability and efficiency through DevOps practices.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Git, Jenkins, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Ltd. - DevOps Engineer (2017 - Present)
- Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab CI.
- Automated infrastructure provisioning and management using Terraform and Ansible.
- Managed and scaled containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes.

Systems Integrators - System Administrator (2015 - 2017)
- Managed and maintained Linux servers and network infrastructure.
- Implemented monitoring solutions using Prometheus and Grafana.

EDUCATION:
Massachusetts Institute of Technology - Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering (2015)
